mapper.select: SELECT min_score, min_score + 10 AS max_score, -- 区间最高成绩 COUNT(*) AS number_of_students -- 统计每个区间内的人数 FROM ( SELECT FLOOR(total_score / 10) * 10 AS min_score FROM course_selection WHERE staff_id = #{teacherId} AND semester = #{semester} AND course_id = #{courseId} AND class_id = #{classId} AND total_score >= 0 AND total_score <= 90 ) AS subquery GROUP BY min_score ORDER BY min_score;

SELECT min_score, min_score + 10 AS max_score, -- 区间最高成绩 COUNT(*) AS number_of_students -- 统计每个区间内的人数 FROM ( SELECT FLOOR(normal_score / 10) * 10 AS min_score FROM course_selection WHERE staff_id = #{teacherId} AND semester = #{semester} AND course_id = #{courseId} AND class_id = #{classId} AND normal_score >= 0 AND normal_score <= 90 ) AS subquery GROUP BY min_score ORDER BY min_score;

SELECT min_score, min_score + 10 AS max_score, -- 区间最高成绩 COUNT(*) AS number_of_students -- 统计每个区间内的人数 FROM ( SELECT FLOOR(test_score / 10) * 10 AS min_score FROM course_selection WHERE staff_id = #{teacherId} AND semester = #{semester} AND course_id = #{courseId} AND class_id = #{classId} AND test_score >= 0 AND test_score <= 90 ) AS subquery GROUP BY min_score ORDER BY min_score;
